Laursen Pedersen Bjerregaard is a 66 year old retired CEO from Germany.
At Siemens AG, Laursen Pedersen Bjerregaard held the position of Plant Manager from 1983 to 1986, developing essential skills in the field.
In 1987, he moved to ThyssenKrupp AG to work as a Operations Director, applying his knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
In 1994, he joined BASF SE as a CEO, taking on new challenges and responsibilities that helped him grow both personally and professionally.
